eventData.title: Solo Stakers Guild @ ETH Taipei
eventData.description: Explore EventsSign InPresented byLidoSubscribeEthereum staking. Events from Lido and community-organized.Hosted BySamuel Chonginsight-softwareCarol Chung64 GoingFZLawrence, Yutaro Nagumo | Windfall and 62 othersContact the HostReport EventCryptoFeatured in TaipeiSolo Stakers Guild @ ETH TaipeiLidoTaipei Nanshan PlazaXinyi District, Taipei CityRegistrationApproval RequiredYour registration is subject to approval by the host.Welcome! To join the event, please register below. Request to JoinYou will be asked to verify token ownership with your wallet.About Event Begin your journey to become an Ethereum solo staker at ETH Taipei 2025! (This event is tailored for newcomers without any technical background.) The Lido Community Lifeguards Initiative (Stakesaurus) brings this event series back to Taipei in 2025 together with AWS, Insight Software, and ETH Taipei following the Asia Blockchain Week & Taipei Blockchain Week editions last year. Join us for a solo staking workshop followed by a networking mixer in the heart of Taipei—Xin Yi District What you will get Be self-sufficient in running your own Ethereum validator node Dedicated AWS testing environment for practice Networking mixer with other aspiring solo stakers and participating projects Participants can expect to go from zero to one on setting up their very own Ethereum validator on Testnet using AWS credits. By combining the skills to run an Ethereum node and the features of the Lido Community Staking Module (CSM), participants will be able to enhance their ETH staking rewards by >2x (~7%) while reducing their required staking collateral to as low as 1.3 ETH per validator key (vs 32 ETH). Supported by: AWS Taiwan Insight Software ETHTaipei Lido Community Lifeguards Initiative 華語版 在 ETH Taipei 2025 開始成為以太坊獨立質押者的旅程吧！(此活動專為沒有任何技術背景的新手量身定制) Stakesaurus，一位 Lido 貢獻者和 Home Staking Summit 的組織者，正在台北信義區中心舉辦獨立質押工作坊，隨後進行交流聚會。 於 ETH Taipei 2025 開始您成為以太坊獨立質押者的旅程！  (此活動專為沒有任何技術背景的新手量身定制)  Stakesaurus，一位 Lido 社區救生員，在去年亞洲區塊鏈週和台北區塊鏈週活動後，於 2025 年將此系列活動重新帶回台北。 歡迎參加我們在台北市中心——信義區舉辦的獨立質押工作坊，隨後還有交流聚會。 您將獲得什麼: 能夠獨立運作自己的以太坊驗證器節點 練習專用的AWS測試環境 與其他有志成為獨立質押者和參與項目進行交流 參與者可以從零開始，使用 AWS 抵用碼 (Credits) 在測試網路上免費設定自己的以太坊驗證器。 透過結合運行以太坊節點的技能和 Lido Community Staking Module (CSM) 的功能，參與者將能夠將其 ETH 質押獎勵提高 2 倍以上(~7%)，同時將其所需的質押抵押品降低至每個驗證者金鑰1.3 ETH（而非 32 ETH）。 支援項目方： AWS 台灣 Insight Software ETH 台北 Lido 社區救生員計劃LocationTaipei Nanshan PlazaNo. 100號, Songren Rd, Xinyi District, Taipei City, Taiwan 11073AWS Office: Enter via Songren Road entrance, head up to level 2 and then pass the gantry on the right by showing the security guard this Luma event page, your ticket, or your email confirmation. AWS 辦公室：從松仁路入口進入，前往 2 層，然後通過右側的龍門架，向保安人員出示此 Luma 活動頁面、您的門票或您的電子郵件確認訊息。Presented byLidoSubscribeEthereum staking. Events from Lido and community-organized.Hosted BySamuel Chonginsight-softwareCarol Chung64 GoingFZLawrence, Yutaro Nagumo | Windfall and 62 othersContact the HostReport EventCryptoWhat's NewDiscoverPricingHelpHost your event with Luma ↗
